step_feedback.feedback: While the first repetition showed good form, the second repetition had significant deviations, particularly in the right wrist and elbow. Focus on maintaining a smoother, controlled movement throughout the exercise.
Both repetitions show some inconsistencies.  Try to keep your arm movements more horizontal and consistent in height.  Ensure you are fully extending your arms.
Inconsistent form across repetitions, especially noticeable in the right elbow and wrist.  Concentrate on controlled movements and maintaining the same range of motion.
The right elbow shows significant deviation in both repetitions.  Pay close attention to maintaining a smooth, horizontal movement and avoid jerky motions.

Significant deviations in both repetitions, especially in the right wrist and elbow.  Focus on controlled movements and maintaining the same range of motion.  The large deviations suggest you may be overexerting yourself.

exercise_summary: You need to improve your Horizontal Pumping technique. Focus on smooth, controlled arm movements, keeping them horizontal at shoulder height.  Pay close attention to your right elbow and wrist, ensuring they move consistently throughout each repetition. Remember to inhale while tightening your muscles and exhale while relaxing.
